relatedRecords.name: DroidconKE
relatedRecords.description: Droidcon is a global conference focused on the engineering of Android applications. Droidcon provides a forum for developers to network with other developers, share techniques, announce apps and products, and to learn and teach.

relatedRecords.name: Bonny Island IWD2020
relatedRecords.description: International Women’s Day (IWD) is marked on March 8th every year. In different regions, the focus of celebrations ranges from general respect and appreciation toward women to a celebration of women’s economic, political, and social achievements. relatedRecords.name: Owasp Ghana Chapter Meeting June 2019
relatedRecords.description: Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP) Ghana Chapter is free to join, open to all. We meet quarterly to discuss & demonstrate web and browser-based vulnerabilities, tools & solutions. More info
